title: The Best of Glenn Beck! - 7/4/18
description:
This is the 'Best of' Glenn for your 4th of July!

From Glenn Beck and all of his team, being reminded of all the benefits of living in the U.S. – such as your liberty, right to vote and ability to pursue your dreams, we wish you a "Happy Independence Day"!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
